subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: No. 20 Sam Querrey defeated No. 14 Nicolás Almagro of Spain in straight sets to join Mardy Fish as the only American men in the fourth round.
snippet: No. 20 Sam Querrey defeated No. 14 Nicolás Almagro of Spain in straight sets to join Mardy Fish as the only American men in the fourth round.
